lead_paragraph: Manchester United reminded their fans of the days when Old Trafford pulsated to thrilling attacking football as they produced a superb performance in a 3-0 home win over Stoke City in the Premier League on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Man United Rekindle Glory Days With 3-0 Win Over Stoke
headline.main: Man United Rekindle Glory Days With 3-0 Win Over Stoke

snippet: Manchester United reminded their fans of the days when Old Trafford pulsated to thrilling attacking football as they produced a superb performance in a 3-0 home win over Stoke City in the Premier League on Tuesday....
